EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in August 2014
EmailTemplate.name: 15 & 16 September Uniform Shop Closed Rosinka
EmailTemplate.subject: 15 & 16 September Uniform Shop Closed Rosinka
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
We would like to inform you that the uniform shop will be closed for 2 days, Monday and Tuesday, the 15th and 16th of September. We hope that all of you successfully purchased uniforms over the last week after we implemented the staggered sales.
We would also like to remind you that if you have not picked up your school contract, please kindly do so as we require the original copy. Copies can be made for your records as well. Please pick up your contract at the uniform shop from Wednesday, 17th September.
Thank you.
Kind Regards,
Rosinka Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
